summary: INCORRECT AXLE WEIGHT INFORMATION ON THE I.D. PLATE.  *BF  DEALER DENIES ANY WRONG DOING AND HAS AGREED TO PAY FOR ONE HALF OF THE LABOR AND PARTS.  THE CONSUMER STATED THAT THE DEALER REQUESTED THAT SHE REFRAIN FROM MAKING ANY STATEMENTS TO GOVERNMENTAL AUTHORITIES OR OTHERS THAT MIGHT LEAD TO CLAIMS OF DEFAMATION OR TRADE DISPARAGEMENT.  *TC
